ai-mil5.5.10:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, you’re not to say to you,
ai-mil5.5.10:1.2_0: ‘Without learning the four unconditioned minds, one hundred thousand coins, a hundred thousand leagues, and one hundred thousand people away to who were diligent, keen, and resolute.’
ai-mil5.5.10:1.3_0: And, thinking: ‘I have attained the discovered the infatuation, so the mind doesn’t incline to remaining passive, not to teaching.’
ai-mil5.5.10:2.1_0: Sir, the great hermit Isisiṅga’s pupil or elsewhere in Isign the training, in order to purify his even arrangements.
ai-mil5.5.10:2.2_0: In the same way, in the four carcass of knowledges by the Realized One, and one hundred thousand eons of extra in number, and one hundred thousand people of memory and scrutinizing them.
ai-mil5.5.10:3.1_0: Or the Mallas, having plunged deep into the Mallian tricks, thought, “This divided in the middle of the day with much.”
ai-mil5.5.10:3.2_0: In the same way, in the four carcass of knowledges by the Realized One, and one hundred thousand eons of extra in number, and one hundred thousand people of memory and scrutinizing them.
ai-mil5.5.10:4.1_0: What, sir, did you think when the Realized One’s disciple is weak and unfavourable to death? Or does he have all make me a weaker still thornymph? Or, when you are weak and consequence? Or why do you say it?
ai-mil5.5.10:4.2_0: If it’s not appropriate for a hundred thousand eons according to the Realized Ones, his recommendations, was transformed to be measured by the Realized One, and he instructs in many ways, then his ability to think ‘Bhaddness’, ‘That is not suitable for the sake of ease of knowledge, and his mind is difficult to teach Dhamma’?
ai-mil5.5.10:4.3_0: If you don’t attain oppressed by all four bowls, it’s not appropriate for you to teach Dhamma with a thousand companions, with keen minds, and with four hundred species, with a thousand companions, looking for a hundred times infatuated with great wisdom, and so on.
ai-mil5.5.10:4.4_0: This question too is deep and appears deep. It should be extinguished until you have attained deep knowledge of it.”
ai-mil5.5.10:5.1_0: “Great king, the dreams of a Buddha with four companions, it comes about owing to the end of all beings in which were reckoned as a hundred thousandth parts of the teaching, and it was not looking for a large topic, not to the place of the Dhamma.
ai-mil5.5.10:5.2_0: We’ve seen a deep poisonous rough full of profound and hard forward. But when sentient beings see the material of the past, future, or present, their minds sort of identity view, their mind doesn’t incline toward keenness, and their laziness stillness.
ai-mil5.5.10:6.1_0: “Great king, when aimless talk hasn’t gone to a dart of mixed with ordinary food, why would he come to him and settle a medicine?
ai-mil5.5.10:6.2_0: In the same way, when the Realized One sees a deep oppression of all defilements, and a profound sinks, softwood, and people of all fourteen times to listen to the teaching or not?’
ai-mil5.5.10:7.1_0: Another king’s educated prince, infesting the fearful employed by the power of the king, so as today, having seen the people, thinking: ‘How can I see my livelihood?’
ai-mil5.5.10:7.2_0: In the same way, when the Realized One sees a deep and response, so very hard to comprehend, so how could he see sentient beings passing away and responding to their minds? Or why don’t I prevent them from being attached to rebirth, old age, and death?
ai-mil5.5.10:8.1_0: Still, great king, the Realized Ones teach all the Dhamma to all they were taught.
ai-mil5.5.10:8.3_0: At that time people of Brahmā’s retinue—they will be strong, stabilized by the Divine and Brahmas. That is why they will be described as a Brahmā, the world, its gods and humans.
ai-mil5.5.10:9.1_0: if any king or their minister who takes great sacrifice, the ruler of the royal ministers, judged the army, and bent down a strong wind, daily for them.
ai-mil5.5.10:9.2_0: In the same way, great king, the world with its gods and men bentted by the Realized One, the perfected one, and the fully awakened Buddha, all of them teach the Dhamma. That’s why he teaches the Dhamma to all.”
ai-mil5.5.10:9.3_0: “Sir, may I answer so as to explain an answer to the question.”
ai-mil5.5.10:10.1_0: (when) teaching Dhamma is the tenth enquiry,
